preload_requirement: Preload to 80% of proof load per ATA-20 standard practices

acceptance_metrics.name: Actuator Attachment Preload
acceptance_metrics.description: Bolt preload verification for actuator attachment
acceptance_metrics.notes: Measured with calibrated load cell during installation

acceptance_metrics.name: Actuator Alignment
acceptance_metrics.description: Angular misalignment at actuator attachment point
acceptance_metrics.notes: Measured with precision angle gauge and laser alignment

notes: Primary actuator attachment for left elevon. Electromechanical linear actuator with 45 kN capacity. Clevis-type attachment with spherical bearing to accommodate angular deflection. Titanium fitting with local reinforcement in control surface structure.
